April 6, 2008 D SCABA Spring Contest (First Section)
SCABA Spring Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Spring Contest scaba-spring-contest-first-section
Town Hall, Hove, Sussex Best Bass Section: Thundersley Brass Best Horn Section: BAE Systems Brass Best Tenor Trombone: Mark Skuse—Thundersley Brass Best Bass Trombone: BAE Systems Brass Conductor: Kevin Jordan—Fairlop Brass
Nov. 9, 2011, 3:31 p.m. April 6, 2015, 7 p.m.
1 Fairlop Brass Kevin Jordan Three Part Invention
2 BAE Systems Keith Woodger Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Curnow]
3 Thundersley Brass Roland Morris Fantasy for Brass Band [Arnold]
4 Uckfield Concert Brass Steve McIntyre Rhapsody in Brass
5 Brackley and District Band Dave Richards James Cook, Circumnavigator
6 Brighton and Hove City Brass Matthew Hackett Symphony of Marches
7 Crystal Palace Band Michael Gray The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
8 Betteshanger Brass Band Tim Vinall
